title: Contraception
creator_credit: John Wiley, FilmFair Communications and Ben Norman
brief_description: Points out the needs for contraceptives during intercourse. Shows the various kinds of contraceptives used today, covering the history of its development, physical properties, the contraceptive principle behind it, and using live photography to show how it works. Discusses the advantages, disadvantages and comparative effectiveness of each method.
